name: Echoes In The Dark (Biddera)
description:
A game inspired by the bravery and heroics of the citizens of ukraine created for the stand with ukraine game jam.

The front line getting even closer, the enemy have cut the power to your city. You must repair an old substation, in the dark. Use echo-location to find your way through and restore power to aid evacuation.  Be careful not to fall down any holes or electrocute yourself! Goodluck!

Controls

Spacebar - Clap

WASD - Movement

F - Pick up object

E - Interact

Left click - Tap object

Right click - Throw held object

Esc / P - Pause
